name: mikroe.click.b102c
short_description: B102C Click is a compact add-on board designed for Bluetooth 5.0 (BLE) communication in various wireless applications. This board features the B102C, a Bluetooth module from Amphenol based on the Realtek RTL8762CMF chip. The board offers BLE v5.0 support, a 20MHz Arm® Cortex® M4F processor, and an integrated antenna for 2.4GHz communication, with low-power modes for optimal energy efficiency. It includes UART and USB Type-C connectivity, a PROG header for debugging, and fully programmable GPIOs.
